description: From Middle English standisshe, standys, standyshe, stantif, stantys, staundische, staundys, stauntyff, stauntys, stonndis, stontis, possibly equivalent to stand (noun or verb) +‎ -ish (forms with -f may be substantival uses of Middle English stantif (“standing”)).

entries.meaning: (obsolete) A stand to hold ink, pens, and other writing accessories; an inkstand.
